content: You’ve really nailed it here, Mateja. The magical thing about the old Medium was the ease and regularity with which I seemed to stumble across unexpected stories that caught my imagination, and amazing new writers to follow. The new Medium is so heavily over-curated that I never seem to stumble across anything new anymore. It’s like all the wild horses have been driven into corrals, and they’re just horses now. The “wild” is gone.
